meanings.definition: A mother, especially one's own mother.
meanings.sent1: My mammie always makes me feel better when I'm sad.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my mammie on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my mammie tells jokes, everyone laughs.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and kindness make her the mammie of our community.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cookies baking reminds me of my mammie's love.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a female caregiver.
meanings.sent1: The kind mammie at the daycare always greets us with a smile.
meanings.sent2: My mammie always knows how to make everything better.
meanings.sent3: The little ones call her 'Mammie Sunshine' because she brightens their day.
meanings.sent4: She is like a guardian angel, our very own mammie watching over us.
meanings.sent5: Her gentle touch and soothing voice make her the best mammie ever.

meanings.definition: A type of sweet dessert made with milk, sugar, and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, we enjoyed a delicious slice of homemade mammie.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street makes the most mouthwatering mammie.
meanings.sent3: I can never resist a second helping of my grandma's famous mammie.
meanings.sent4: The creamy texture of the mammie melted in my mouth like a dream.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of freshly baked mammie filled the kitchen with joy.
